name: df-apply
body: |- wceq(capply, ccom(ccom(cbigcup, cbigcup), ccom(cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(cres(cep, csingles), universe)))), ccom(ccom(csingle, cimg), cpprod(cid, csingle)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ Apply =((Bigcup ∘ Bigcup)∘(((𝕌 × 𝕌)\ ran(((𝕌(×)∈)∆((∈ |` Singletons)(×)𝕌))))∘((Singleton ∘ Img)∘ pprod(=, Singleton))))
comment: Define the application function. See ~ brapply for its value. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Apr-2014.)
